Title: Episode 5
Plot: On the day that Kev should be happily celebrating his 35th birthday, his mother throws herself from her balcony. To add to his woes, he sees his ex-wife Roxy, who's recently out of prison and far from reformed, at the funeral. Fatherhood has had a positive effect on Lip and Mandy.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, nudity, drug use and offensive language
GuestStars: Rob James-Collier, Maxton G. Beesley, Jill Halfpenny
